query.value:
select
 *,
 'AVS' as entity_source
from audits.audit_answers
where created_at > '@{activity('DW Answers get date').output.firstRow.max}'
or modified_at > '@{activity('DW Answers get date').output.firstRow.max}'
limit 0

select
 *,
 jsonb_extract_path_text(survey_result::jsonb, '0', 'result') as survey_result_value,
 jsonb_extract_path_text(survey_result::jsonb, '1', 'result') as survey_result_value_secondary,
 'AVS' as entity_source,
 null as allowance,
 null as briefing_documents
from audits.audit
where created_at > '@{activity('DW Audits get date').output.firstRow.max}'
or modified_at > '@{activity('DW Audits get date').output.firstRow.max}'

select
 *,
 'AVS' as entity_source
from clients.client
where created_at > '@{activity('DW Clients get date').output.firstRow.max}'
or modified_at > '@{activity('DW Clients get date').output.firstRow.max}'

select
 *,
 'AVS' as entity_source
from orders.order
where created_at > '@{activity('DW Orders get date').output.firstRow.max}'
or modified_at > '@{activity('DW Orders get date').output.firstRow.max}'

select
 *,
 'AVS' as entity_source
from surveys.revision_questions
where created_at > '@{activity('DW Questions get date').output.firstRow.max}'
or modified_at > '@{activity('DW Questions get date').output.firstRow.max}'
limit 0

select
 *,
 'AVS' as entity_source
from questions.question
where created_at > '@{activity('DW QuestionTemplates get date').output.firstRow.max}'
or modified_at > '@{activity('DW QuestionTemplates get date').output.firstRow.max}'

select
 *,
 'AVS' as entity_source
from surveys.revision
where created_at > '@{activity('DW Revisions get date').output.firstRow.max}'
or modified_at > '@{activity('DW Revisions get date').output.firstRow.max}'

select
 *,
 coalesce(
	 jsonb_extract_path_text(organisation_level_code::jsonb, '0', 'org_level_1'),
	 jsonb_extract_path_text(organisation_level_code::jsonb, '1', 'org_level_1'),
	 jsonb_extract_path_text(organisation_level_code::jsonb, '2', 'org_level_1'),
	 jsonb_extract_path_text(organisation_level_code::jsonb, '3', 'org_level_1')
 ) as org_level1,
  coalesce(
	 jsonb_extract_path_text(organisation_level_code::jsonb, '0', 'org_level_2'),
	 jsonb_extract_path_text(organisation_level_code::jsonb, '1', 'org_level_2'),
	 jsonb_extract_path_text(organisation_level_code::jsonb, '2', 'org_level_2'),
	 jsonb_extract_path_text(organisation_level_code::jsonb, '3', 'org_level_2')
 ) as org_level2,
  coalesce(
	 jsonb_extract_path_text(organisation_level_code::jsonb, '0', 'org_level_3'),
	 jsonb_extract_path_text(organisation_level_code::jsonb, '1', 'org_level_3'),
	 jsonb_extract_path_text(organisation_level_code::jsonb, '2', 'org_level_3'),
	 jsonb_extract_path_text(organisation_level_code::jsonb, '3', 'org_level_3')
 ) as org_level3,
  coalesce(
	 jsonb_extract_path_text(organisation_level_code::jsonb, '0', 'org_level_4'),
	 jsonb_extract_path_text(organisation_level_code::jsonb, '1', 'org_level_4'),
	 jsonb_extract_path_text(organisation_level_code::jsonb, '2', 'org_level_4'),
	 jsonb_extract_path_text(organisation_level_code::jsonb, '3', 'org_level_4')
 ) as org_level4,
 'AVS' as entity_source
from sites.site
where created_at > '@{activity('DW Sites get date').output.firstRow.max}'
or modified_at > '@{activity('DW Sites get date').output.firstRow.max}'

select
 *,
 'AVS' as entity_source
from surveys.survey
where created_at > '@{activity('DW Surveys get date').output.firstRow.max}'
or modified_at > '@{activity('DW Surveys get date').output.firstRow.max}'

select
 *,
 'AVS' as entity_source
from users.user
where created_at > '@{activity('DW Users get date').output.firstRow.max}'
or modified_at > '@{activity('DW Users get date').output.firstRow.max}'

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		query_notes as string,
		query_category as string,
		survey_result as string,
		visit_info as string,
		submitted_date as string,
		approval_date as string,
		deadline_date as string,
		date_of_visit as string,
		purchase_cost as double,
		allowance as double,
		mileage as double,
		entrance_charge as double,
		travel_expenses as double,
		travel_expenses_type as string,
		travel_expenses_description as string,
		reclaimable_expenses as double,
		reclaimable_expenses_type as string,
		reclaimable_expenses_description as string,
		paid as boolean,
		batched as boolean,
		payroll_date as string,
		pay_date as string,
		email_note as string,
		status as string,
		order_id as string,
		site_id as string,
		approved_by_id as string,
		auditor_id as string,
		item_to_order as string,
		auditor_instructions as string,
		auditor_pay_per_audit as double,
		approving_notes as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		entity_source as string,
		survey_result_secondary as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Audits
source(output(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Clients
source(output(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		address_1 as string,
		address_2 as string,
		address_3 as string,
		city as string,
		post_code as string,
		county as string,
		country as string,
		directions as string,
		approving_notes as string,
		code as string,
		status as string,
		client_id as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1 as string,
		org_level2 as string,
		org_level3 as string,
		org_level4 as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Sites
source(output(
		id as integer,
		bitValue as boolean,
		stringValue as string,
		valueType as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimYesNo
Sites select(mapColumn(
		site_id = id,
		site_client_id = client_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SiteClientId
Clients select(mapColumn(
		id,
		client_type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ClientType
SurveyResult, SiteClientId join(PickImportantColumns@site_id == SiteClientId@site_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSite
JoinSite, ClientType join(site_client_id == ClientType@id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinClient
JoinClient aggregate(groupBy(date_of_visit,
		client_type),
	true_result_count = sum(true_result_count),
		false_result_count = sum(false_result_count),
		total_count = count(),
		true_percentage = sum(true_result_count) / count(),
		false_percentage = sum(false_result_count) / count()) ~> Aggregate1
CalculateFields, TrueFalseResultCount join(lower(survey_result) == lower(stringValue),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SurveyResult
OnlyActiveStatus select(mapColumn(
		id,
		query_category,
		survey_result,
		date_of_visit,
		status,
		site_id,
		item_to_order
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PickImportantColumns
DimYesNo derive(bitValue = bitValue,
		stringValue = stringValue,
		true_result_count = iif(bitValue, 1, 0),
		false_result_count = iif(bitValue, 0, 1)) ~> TrueFalseResultCount
Audits filter(status == 'approved') ~> OnlyActiveStatus
JoinClient aggregate(groupBy(client_type),
	count = count(),
		true_percent = sum(true_result_count) / count()) ~> Aggregate2
SurveyResult aggregate(groupBy(item_to_order),
	count = count(),
		true_percent = sum(true_result_count) / count()) ~> Aggregate3
SurveyResult aggregate(groupBy(item_to_order,
		date_of_visit),
	count = count(),
		true_percent = sum(true_result_count) / count(),
		false_percent = sum(false_result_count) / count()) ~> Aggregate4
PickImportantColumns derive(date_of_visit = toDate(regexExtract(date_of_visit,'....-..-..',0),'yyyy-MM-dd'),
		month_of_visit = toDate(regexExtract(date_of_visit,'....-..',0),'yyyy-MM'),
		week_of_visit = concat(toString(year(toDate(date_of_visit))), lpad(toString(weekOfYear(toDate(date_of_visit))), 2, '0')),
		year = year(toDate(date_of_visit)),
		month = month(toDate(date_of_visit)),
		week = weekOfYear(toDate(date_of_visit)),
		item_to_order = lower(coalesce(item_to_order, 'not specified'))) ~> CalculateFields
JoinClient aggregate(groupBy(client_type,
		item_to_order,
		date_of_visit),
	count = count(),
		true_percent = sum(true_result_count) / count(),
		false_percent = sum(false_result_count) / count()) ~> DayByClientTypeProduct
SurveyResult aggregate(groupBy(item_to_order),
	count = count()) ~> AverageByProduct
JoinClient aggregate(groupBy(month_of_visit,
		item_to_order,
		client_type),
	count = count(),
		true_percent = sum(true_result_count) / count(),
		false_percent = sum(false_result_count) / count()) ~> Aggregate6
JoinClient aggregate(groupBy(client_type,
		week_of_visit,
		item_to_order),
	count = count(),
		true_percent = sum(true_result_count) / count()) ~> Aggregate7
JoinClient aggregate(groupBy(client_type,
		week_of_visit),
	count = count(),
		true_percent = sum(true_result_count) / count()) ~> Aggregate8
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TDailyByClientType
Aggregate2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		client_type,
		count,
		true_percent
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TClientTypes
Aggregate3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		item_to_order,
		count,
		true_percent
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TProducts
Aggregate4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		item_to_order,
		date_of_visit,
		count,
		true_percent,
		false_percent
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TDailyByProdyct
AverageByProduct sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TAverageByProduct
DayByClientTypeProduct sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		client_type,
		item_to_order,
		date_of_visit,
		count,
		true_percent,
		false_percent
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TDailyByClientTypeProduct
Aggregate6 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TMonthlyByClientTypeProduct
Aggregate7 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		client_type,
		item_to_order,
		week_of_visit,
		count,
		true_percent
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TWeeklyByClientTypeProduct
Aggregate8 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		client_type,
		week_of_visit,
		count,
		true_percent
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TWeeklyByClient

source(output(
		Order as string,
		Client as string,
		Visit as string,
		Site as string,
		{Premises Name} as string,
		Address1 as string,
		Address2 as string,
		Address3 as string,
		City as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		{Item to order} as string,
		{Actual Visit Date} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		{Actual Visit Time} as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss.SSS\'Z\'',
		{AM / PM} as string,
		{Pass-Fail} as string,
		{Pass-Fail2} as string,
		{Abort Reason} as string,
		{Extra Site 1} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'excel',
	container: 'audits',
	fileName: '3 year data v3.xlsx',
	sheetName: '3 year data v1',
	firstRowAsHeader: true) ~> InputExcel
source(output(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingClients
source(output(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		address_1 as string,
		address_2 as string,
		address_3 as string,
		city as string,
		post_code as string,
		county as string,
		country as string,
		directions as string,
		approving_notes as string,
		code as string,
		status as string,
		client_id as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1 as string,
		org_level2 as string,
		org_level3 as string,
		org_level4 as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingSites
source(output(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		schedule_type as string,
		item_to_order as string,
		order_info as string,
		visits_to_be_billed as integer,
		start_date as string,
		end_date as string,
		auditor_pay_per_audit as string,
		client_charge_per_audit as string,
		auditor_instructions as string,
		email_subject as string,
		email_survey_result as string,
		exclude_from_client_reporting as boolean,
		narv_visits_only as boolean,
		status as string,
		currency as string,
		client_id as string,
		revision_id as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingOrders
source(output(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		query_notes as string,
		query_category as string,
		survey_result as string,
		visit_info as string,
		submitted_date as string,
		approval_date as string,
		deadline_date as string,
		date_of_visit as string,
		purchase_cost as double,
		allowance as double,
		mileage as double,
		entrance_charge as double,
		travel_expenses as double,
		travel_expenses_type as string,
		travel_expenses_description as string,
		reclaimable_expenses as double,
		reclaimable_expenses_type as string,
		reclaimable_expenses_description as string,
		paid as boolean,
		batched as boolean,
		payroll_date as string,
		pay_date as string,
		email_note as string,
		status as string,
		order_id as string,
		site_id as string,
		approved_by_id as string,
		auditor_id as string,
		item_to_order as string,
		auditor_instructions as string,
		auditor_pay_per_audit as double,
		approving_notes as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		entity_source as string,
		survey_result_secondary as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingAudits
ExistingClients select(mapColumn(
		existing_client_id = id,
		existing_client_legacy_id = legacy_id,
		existing_client_entity_source = entity_source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ExistingCliendIds
ExcludeEmpty aggregate(groupBy(Client),
	name = max(Client)) ~> UniqueClients
UniqueClients, ExistingCliendIds lookup(Client == existing_client_legacy_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(existing_client_id, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ClientsLookedUp
ClientsLookedUp derive(id = coalesce(existing_client_id, Client),
		status = 'active',
		legacy_id = coalesce(existing_client_legacy_id, Client),
		entity_source = 'historical-import') ~> ComputedColumns
InputExcel filter(!isNull(Client)) ~> ExcludeEmpty
ComputedColumns filter(isNull(existing_client_entity_source) || existing_client_entity_source != 'AVS') ~> ExcludeAVSOwned
ExcludeAVSOwned alterRow(insertIf(isNull(existing_client_id)),
	updateIf(!isNull(existing_client_id))) ~> EstablishMerge
ExcludeEmpty aggregate(groupBy(Site),
	Client = max(Client),
		{Premises Name} = max({Premises Name}),
		Address1 = max(Address1),
		Address2 = max(Address2),
		Address3 = max(Address3),
		City = max(City),
		{Post Code} = max({Post Code})) ~> UniqueSites
ExistingSites select(mapColumn(
		existing_site_id = id,
		existing_site_legacy_id = legacy_id,
		existing_site_entity_source = entity_source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ExistingSiteIds
UniqueSites, ExistingSiteIds lookup(Site == existing_site_legacy_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(existing_site_id, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SiteLookedUp
ClientLookedUp derive(id = coalesce(existing_site_id, Site),
		legacy_id = Site,
		client_id = coalesce(existing_client_legacy_id, Client),
		status = 'active',
		entity_source = 'historic-import') ~> ComputedSiteColumns
SiteLookedUp, ExistingCliendIds lookup(Client == existing_client_legacy_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(existing_client_id, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ClientLookedUp
ComputedSiteColumns filter(isNull(existing_site_id) || existing_site_entity_source != 'AVS') ~> ExcludeAVSOwnedSites
ExcludeAVSOwnedSites alterRow(insertIf(isNull(existing_site_id)),
	updateIf(!isNull(existing_site_id))) ~> EstablishSiteMerge
ExcludeEmpty aggregate(groupBy(Order),
	{Item to order} = max({Item to order}),
		Client = max(Client)) ~> UniqueOrders
UniqueOrders, ExistingCliendIds lookup(Client == existing_client_legacy_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(existing_client_id, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> OrderClientsLookup
OrderClientsLookup derive(client_id = coalesce(existing_client_id, Client),
		status = 'active',
		exclude_from_client_reporting = false(),
		id = Order,
		legacy_id = Order,
		entity_source = 'historic-import') ~> ComputedOrderColumns
ExistingOrdersLoookup alterRow(insertIf(isNull(existing_order_id)),
	updateIf(true())) ~> EstablishOrderMerge
ExistingOrders select(mapColumn(
		existing_order_id = id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ExistingOrderIds
ComputedOrderColumns, ExistingOrderIds lookup(Order == existing_order_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(existing_order_id, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistingOrdersLoookup
ExistingAudits select(mapColumn(
		existing_audit_id = id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ExistingAuditIds
ExcludeEmpty, ExistingAuditIds lookup(Visit == existing_audit_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(existing_audit_id, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> AuditsLookup
AuditOrderLookup derive(id = Visit,
		order_id = coalesce(existing_order_id, Order),
		site_id = coalesce(existing_site_id, Site),
		legacy_id = Visit,
		date_of_visit = concat(toString({Actual Visit Date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),' ', toString(hour({Actual Visit Time}), '00'), ':', toString(minute({Actual Visit Time}), '00'), ':', toString(second({Actual Visit Time}), '00'), {AM / PM}),
		status = 'approved') ~> ComputedAuditColumns

	broadcast: 'auto')~> AuditOrderLookup

	updateIf(true())) ~> EstablishAuditMerge

source(output(
		Order as string,
		Client as string,
		Visit as string,
		Site as string,
		{Premises Name} as string,
		Address1 as string,
		Address2 as string,
		Address3 as string,
		City as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		{Item to order} as string,
		{Actual Visit Date} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		{Actual Visit Time} as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss.SSS\'Z\'',
		{AM / PM} as string,
		{Pass-Fail} as string,
		{Pass-Fail2} as string,
		{Abort Reason} as string,
		{Extra Site 1} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'excel',
	container: 'audits',
	fileName: '3 year data v3.xlsx',
	sheetName: '3 year data v1',
	firstRowAsHeader: true) ~> InputExcel

		existing_client_id = id,
		existing_client_legacy_id = legacy_id,
		existing_client_entity_source = entity_source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ExistingCliendIds
InputExcel filter(!isNull(Client)) ~> ExcludeEmpty
ExistingSites select(mapColumn(
		existing_site_id = id,
		existing_site_legacy_id = legacy_id,
		existing_site_entity_source = entity_source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ExistingSiteIds
ExcludeEmpty aggregate(groupBy(Order),
	{Item to order} = max({Item to order}),
		Client = max(Client)) ~> UniqueOrders
UniqueOrders, ExistingCliendIds lookup(Client == existing_client_legacy_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(existing_client_id, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> OrderClientsLookup
OrderClientsLookup derive(client_id = coalesce(existing_client_id, Client),
		status = 'active',
		exclude_from_client_reporting = false(),
		id = Order,
		legacy_id = Order,
		entity_source = 'historic-import') ~> ComputedOrderColumns
ExistingOrdersLoookup alterRow(insertIf(isNull(existing_order_id)),
	updateIf(true())) ~> EstablishOrderMerge
ExistingOrders select(mapColumn(
		existing_order_id = id

	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ExistingAuditIds

	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(existing_audit_id, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> AuditsLookup
AuditOrderLookup derive(id = Visit,
		order_id = coalesce(existing_order_id, Order),
		site_id = coalesce(existing_site_id, Site),
		legacy_id = Visit,
		date_of_visit = concat(toString({Actual Visit Date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),' ', toString(hour({Actual Visit Time}), '00'), ':', toString(minute({Actual Visit Time}), '00'), ':', toString(second({Actual Visit Time}), '00'), {AM / PM}),
		status = 'approved') ~> ComputedAuditColumns

	asc(existing_site_id, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> AuditSiteLookup
